titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the R. B. McGinnis papers, circa 1908-circa 1956

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Ann Mulfort February 2013

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

bioghist.head: Biography of R. B. McGinnis
bioghist.p: Richard B. McGinnis (b. 1879) was a consulting mining engineer. He began his career in 1898 as an assayer and chemist. He worked for various mining companies and engineering firms before establishing his own consulting firm in 1927. Most of his work was in the Western United States and Canada, but also included South America, Mexico, and Africa.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes correspondence, assay reports, mine reports, maps, and photographs, all related to McGinnis' consulting work (1908-1955). There are also federal and California income tax returns for 1954-1956.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: No data may be published with the name of R.B. McGinnis unless permission be obtained from the company or individuals who paid him to do the work.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are no known other archival collections created by R. B. McGinnis at the date of processing.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Description, Box Number, Folder Number, Collection Name, Collection Number, American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming.
